description: Looking for a creative way to spice up your steak? Try this quick and easy Mexican-style beef recipe when entertaining guests.
keywords: Coleslaw,High protein,Low sugar,Dinner Made Easy,Quick & easy,Beef
name: 15-Minute Mexican-style Beef With Corn Coleslaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g pkt Woolworths beef oyster blade steak
420g can Woolworths corn kernels, rinsed, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Place beef on a plate. Sprinkle both sides with taco seasoning.

Heat 1 tbs of oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add beef. Cook for 2 minutes each side for medium-rare or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate. Cover loosely with foil. Rest for 2 minutes. Wash and dry frying pan.

Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in the cleaned frying pan over medium-high heat. Add corn. Cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until browned. Transfer to a large bowl. Cool slightly. Add the kaleslaw salad and dressing from packet. Toss to combine.
Thickly slice beef. Spoon salad mix onto serving plates. Top with seed mix from kaleslaw kit. Top with beef and season with pepper. Serve.
